Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach in Dubai (Jumeirah Beach Residence), you'll be minutes from The Beach Mall and close to Dubai Marina. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Dubai Marina Mall and Skydive Dubai.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 438 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon. Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a poolside bar or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has 12430 square feet (1155 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a poolside bar or a swim-up bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach in Dubai (Jumeirah Beach Residence), you'll be minutes from The Beach Mall and close to Dubai Marina. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Dubai Marina Mall and Skydive Dubai.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Beach Mall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Dubai Marina Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Skydive Dubai - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Dubai Marina - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Montgomerie Golf Club - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
American University of Dubai - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Emirates Golf Club - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Ibn Battuta Mall - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Jebel Ali Race Course - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Dubai College - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Aquaventure - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Jumeirah Golf Estates - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Ski Dubai - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Mall of the Emirates - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Souk Madinat Jumeirah - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi

The preferred airport for Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 29.4 km / 18.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Double Superior Room with View + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
For Dynamic bookings created from 22nd March 2017 onwards, all taxes and Tourism Fee are included in the rate. For any Dynamic bookings created before this date, the Municipality Fee has to be paid directly to the hotel by the guest.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
